entities.name: madam pomfrey
entities.description: Madam Pomfrey is the nurse who lets Harry, Ron, and Hermione visit Hermione in the hospital wing. She says there's no point talking to a Petrified person.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall has given permission for Harry, Ron, and Hermione to visit Hermione.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is the person who is petrified and lying in bed. She doesn't seem to know that she has visitors.

relationships.description: Madam Pomfrey lets Harry, Ron, and Hermione visit Hermione because Professor McGonagall has given permission.
Madam Pomfrey is caring for Hermione in the hospital wing.
